0010100000011011 1001110010110001 1 -> sum: 1100010011001101, cout: 0
1011011111011101 1100110111001000 0 -> sum: 1000010110100101, cout: 1

1010101001010100 0001111001111011 0 -> sum: 1100100011001111, cout: 0
0011101100010111 1111110111101000 0 -> sum: 0011100011111111, cout: 1
